entities.name: bulgarians
entities.description: The text mentions that the Bulgarians filed between the rows of seats in the box.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is mentioned as calling out the name of each Bulgarian.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is described as looking a real mess with two black eyes and holding the Snitch.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as shaking hands with each Bulgarian.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry notices Krum's condition and the reaction of the stadium to his name being announced.

entities.name: irish team
entities.description: The Irish team is mentioned as coming next.

entities.name: aidan lynch
entities.description: Aidan Lynch is being supported by Moran and Connolly.

entities.name: moran
entities.description: Moran is mentioned as supporting Aidan Lynch.

entities.name: connolly
entities.description: Connolly is mentioned as supporting Aidan Lynch.

relationships.description: Bagman called out the name of each Bulgarian.
Fudge shook hands with each Bulgarian.
The whole stadium gave a resounding roar when Krum's name was announced.
